titles.title: Federal Reserve Board Abolition Act
To abolish the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal reserve banks, to repeal the Federal Reserve Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 7/17/2003--Introduced. Federal Reserve Board Abolition Act - Abolishes the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and each Federal reserve bank. Repeals the Federal Reserve Act. Prescribes implementation guidelines.
